column4: so, dumb question, if I have a box that is 5.04 and another that is 5.10, if I copy the 5.10 sources.list to the 5.04 box and do apt-get update ; apt-get upgrade, will the 5.04 box become 5.10?
you can just change the word hoary in each line of sources to breezy ;)
yes you did, for your friends ;)
